column1: Little Goat Diner////Our waiter was fun
column2: friendly and was happy to joke around with us. He was attentive
column3: but not overly so. The whole atmosphere in the place was lively but not jarring
column4: a perfect place for a Saturday night meal after a long day of exploring downtown Chicago. And for a Celiac like myself
column5: being able to have a banh mi sandwich on gluten-free bread was just what the doctor ordered.
